newsitem.title: USA: Microsoft Windows NT 5.0 to ship in '98 - report.
newsitem.headline: Microsoft Windows NT 5.0 to ship in '98 - report.

text.p: Microsoft Corp officials have informed a core group of developers that Windows NT 5.0 will not ship until the first quarter of 1998, according to a report in Computer Reseller News Web site.

The publication said at a nondisclosure briefing held this week Microsoft operating systems experts told a group of about 50 developers that the initial beta for Windows NT 5.0 will not be ready until late this summer, at the earliest.
The final versions of Windows NT Workstation and Server 5.0 are now slated for early next year, rather than late 1997, as Microsoft had said previously, officials said.
